com.ibm.team.interop.common.service

Interface IInteropService


  • public interface IInteropService
    Service interface for the Interop component.

    0.5

    • Method Detail

      • saveProxy

        IExternalProxy saveProxy(IExternalProxy proxy)
                         throws TeamRepositoryException
        Save an updated proxy for an external object to the database. The incoming proxy object must be a working copy of an existing item.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy for the external object; must be a working copy; never null
        Returns:
        the updated proxy with a new state
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if the proxy was not found in the database
        TeamRepositoryException - if there is an error updating the state in the repository

      • saveProxyWithTargetItem

        IExternalProxy saveProxyWithTargetItem(IExternalProxy proxy,
                                     IItemHandle targetItemHandle)
                                       throws TeamRepositoryException
        Save a new or updated proxy for an external object that is to be linked to a Jazz item. The incoming proxy object can be either a newly-created item (in memory) or a working copy of an existing item.

        A proxy must always be associated with an external object (identified by a URI) and/or a Jazz item. If the targetItemHandle argument is non-null, then either the proxy must not already exist, or it must already be associated with the same item. Once created, such an association cannot be changed.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy for the external object; either a new item or a working copy; never null
        targetItemHandle - the handle of the associated Jazz item, or null if existing proxy is already linked to an item
        Returns:
        the updated proxy with a new state
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if there is an error updating the state in the repository

      • saveProxyWithUri

        IExternalProxy saveProxyWithUri(IExternalProxy proxy,
                              java.lang.String uri)
                                throws TeamRepositoryException
        Save a new or updated proxy for an external object to the database. The incoming proxy object can be either a newly-created item (in memory) or a working copy of an existing item.

        A proxy must always be associated with some external object (identified by a URI) and/or a Jazz item. If the uri argument is non-null, then either the proxy must not already exist, or it must already be associated with the same external object. Once created, such an association cannot be changed.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy for the external object; either a new item or a working copy; never null
        uri - the URI for the external object as a string, or null if existing proxy is already linked to an external object. If not null, the string must be valid for the URI.URI(String) constructor (that is, illegal characters must be escaped)
        Returns:
        the updated proxy with a new state
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if there is an error updating the state in the repository

      • fetchProxy

        IExternalProxy fetchProxy(IExternalProxyHandle proxyHandle,
                        java.lang.String[] properties)
                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Fetch the current (latest) state of a proxy from the repository.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxyHandle - handle identifying the proxy to fetch.
        properties - the list of names of item properties; the strings must be valid property names for the IExternalProxy item type; duplicate property names are tolerated; com.ibm.team.repository.service.IRepositoryItemService#COMPLETE (null) means the complete item should be retrieved
        Returns:
        the proxy item for the given handle, with the requested properties retrieved from the repository
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if the item was not found
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • findProxybyUri

        IExternalProxy findProxybyUri(java.lang.String uri)
                              throws TeamRepositoryException
        Retrieve a proxy that may be replicating an external object.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        uri - the URI for the external object as a string. The string must be valid for the URI.URI(String) constructor (that is, illegal characters must be escaped)
        Returns:
        the proxy for the external object, or null if none
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • findProxybyTargetItem

        IExternalProxy findProxybyTargetItem(IItemHandle targetItem)
                                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Retrieve any proxy for an external object that is being synchronized with a Jazz item, if any.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        targetItem - the target item of the proxy; never null
        Returns:
        the proxy for an associated external object, or null if none
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • findProxiesByTargetItemType

        IExternalProxyHandle[] findProxiesByTargetItemType(IItemType targetItemType)
                                                   throws TeamRepositoryException
        Find all proxies that are linked to Jazz items of a given type.

        NOTE: this method can return a very large number of items. Use it cautiously.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        targetItemType - the type of the items that proxies may be linked to
        Returns:
        array of handles for linked proxies; may be empty; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • findProxybyExternalState

        IExternalProxy findProxybyExternalState(IExternalStateHandle xstateHandle)
                                        throws TeamRepositoryException
        Retrieve a proxy for an external object given the replicated state for that object.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        xstateHandle - the handle for the replicated state; never null
        Returns:
        the proxy associated with the replicated state, or null if none
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • findExternalStatebyUri

        IExternalState findExternalStatebyUri(java.lang.String uri)
                                      throws TeamRepositoryException
        Retrieve any external state for a proxy identified by an external URI. If there is such a proxy, and it has external state, then the latest state is returned.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        uri - the URI for the external object as a string. The string must be valid for the URI.URI(String) constructor (that is, illegal characters must be escaped)
        Returns:
        the latest external state stored for the external object, or null if none
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • getUri

        java.lang.String getUri(IExternalProxyHandle proxy)
                        throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get the URI for an external object that is represented by a proxy, as a string.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy handle for the external object; never null
        Returns:
        the URI string of the external object that the proxy is linked to; may be null; all non-USASCII characters are escaped
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if there is no external object link
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • getTargetItem

        IItemHandle getTargetItem(IExternalProxyHandle proxy)
                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get any Jazz item that is being synchronized with an external object, given the proxy for the external object.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy handle for the external object; never null
        Returns:
        the Jazz item being synchronized with the external object, or null if none
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • getTargetItemState

        IExternalState getTargetItemState(IExternalProxyHandle proxyHandle)
                                  throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get the properties of a Jazz item that is being synchronized with an external object, given the proxy for the external object. The properties returned are those defined to be synchronized (in either direction) by the synchronization rule attached to the proxy.

        THIS METHOD IS TENTATIVE AND SHOULD NOT BE USED OUTSIDE THE INTEROP COMPONENT

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxyHandle - the handle for the external proxy
        Returns:
        an ExternalState object containing the properties being synchronized in either direction, or null if there is no target item being synchronized
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if there is an error getting the state from the repository

      • getLastSyncedInExternalState

        IExternalState getLastSyncedInExternalState(IExternalProxy proxy)
                                            throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get the last replicated state associated with a proxy that was synchronized into a Jazz item. In other words, the returned state (if any) was the most recent state successfully used as the source of incoming synchronization with a Jazz item.

        The state is represented by an IExternalState object; use the IExternalState.getState() to get the state properties (as a map).

        If the proxy has no associated replicated state, or it was never synchronized in the incoming direction with a Jazz item, then null is returned.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy for the external object; never null
        Returns:
        the replicated state that was last synced into a Jazz item, as an IExternalState object; null if there is no replicated state, or it was never synchronized, or if this proxy state was fetched partially and does not include the IExternalProxy.LAST_SYNCED_IN_EXTERNAL_STATE_ID_PROPERTY
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if there is an error getting the state from the repository

      • getLastSyncedOutExternalState

        IExternalState getLastSyncedOutExternalState(IExternalProxy proxy)
                                             throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get the last replicated state associated with a proxy that a Jazz item was synchronized into. In other words, the returned state (if any) was the most recent state that was successfully created as a result of outgoing synchronization with a Jazz item.

        The state is represented by an IExternalState object; use the IExternalState.getState() to get the state properties (as a map).

        If the proxy has no associated replicated state, or it was never synchronized in the outgoing direction with a Jazz item, then null is returned.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy for the external object; never null
        Returns:
        the replicated state that was last synced out from a Jazz item, as an IExternalState object; null if there is no replicated state, or it was never synchronized, or if this proxy state was fetched partially and does not include the IExternalProxy.LAST_SYNCED_OUT_EXTERNAL_STATE_ID_PROPERTY
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if there is an error getting the state from the repository

      • getExternalState

        IExternalState getExternalState(IExternalProxy proxy)
                                throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get the replicated state associated with a proxy. This method can be used to get an external state object which can be used to create a working copy for updating.

        Note that, if this proxy is being synchronized with a Jazz item, the returned state may not yet have been synchronized - it represents the latest state received from the external object.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy for the external object; never null
        Returns:
        the latest replicated state associated with the proxy, as an IExternalState object; null if there is no replicated state, or if this proxy state was fetched partially and does not include the replicated state property
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if there is an error getting the state from the repository

      • saveExternalState

        IExternalState saveExternalState(IExternalState xstate)
                                 throws TeamRepositoryException
        Save new state for an external object to the database. The incoming state object must be a working copy of an existing item.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        xstate - the external state container; must be a working copy; never null
        Returns:
        the update external state with a new Jazz item state
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if the state object was not found in the database
        TeamRepositoryException - if there is an error updating the state in the repository

      • fetchExternalState

        IExternalState fetchExternalState(IExternalStateHandle externalStateHandle)
                                  throws TeamRepositoryException
        Fetch the current (latest) state of the replicated state for an external object from the repository.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        externalStateHandle - handle identifying the ExternalState item to fetch
        Returns:
        the ExternalState item for the given handle
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if the item was not found
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • addBlockingProxy

        void addBlockingProxy(IExternalProxyHandle blockedProxyHandle,
                    IExternalProxyHandle blockingProxyHandle,
                    boolean incoming)
                      throws TeamRepositoryException
        Add a blocking proxy to the set of proxies that block synchronization for a given proxy. In the incoming direction, a blocking proxy represents an external object that has not yet been replicated or synchronized with a Jazz item (and which is needed in order to synchronize the object that depends on the blocking object). In the outgoing direction, a blocking proxy represents a Jazz item that has not yet been synchronized with an external object (and which is needed in order to synchronize the item that depends on the blocking item).

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        blockedProxyHandle - handle for the proxy being blocked
        blockingProxyHandle - handle for the uninitialized proxy that is causing the blocking
        incoming - if true, incoming synchronization is blocked; if false, outgoing synchronization is blocked
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if handles refer to non-existent items
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • addDependsOnProxy

        void addDependsOnProxy(IExternalProxyHandle dependentProxyHandle,
                     IExternalProxyHandle dependsOnProxyHandle)
                       throws TeamRepositoryException
        Add a depends on proxy to the set of proxies that a given proxy depends on. In the incoming direction, a depends on proxy represents an external object whose changes need to trigger synchronization of the dependent proxy in order to reflect the changes in the depends on proxy. Only incoming sync is supported.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        dependentProxyHandle - handle for the proxy that depends on the other proxy
        dependsOnProxyHandle - handle for the proxy whose changes need to be reflected in the other proxy
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if handles refer to non-existent items
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • getBlockingProxies

        IExternalProxyHandle[] getBlockingProxies(IExternalProxyHandle proxyHandle,
                                        boolean incoming)
                                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get any proxies that are blocking synchronization of a given proxy, in the specified direction.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxyHandle - handle for the proxy that may be blocked
        incoming - if true, return proxies blocking incoming synchronization; if false, return proxies blocking outgoing synchronization
        Returns:
        array of handles for proxies blocking synchronization; may be empty; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if handle refers to non-existent item
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • getDependsOnProxies

        IExternalProxyHandle[] getDependsOnProxies(IExternalProxyHandle proxyHandle)
                                           throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get any proxies that the given proxy depends on.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        proxyHandle - handle for the proxy that depends on the other proxy
        Returns:
        array of handles for proxies that the given proxy depends on; may be empty; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if handle refers to non-existent item
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • saveExternalRepositoryConnection

        IItemsResponse saveExternalRepositoryConnection(IExternalRepositoryConnection externalConnection)
                                                throws TeamRepositoryException
        Save a new or updated external repository connection. The incoming object must be either a new item or a working copy of an existing item.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        externalConnection - the item to save; must not be null
        Returns:
        a response descriptor containing the saved item (if successful) and an operation report; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • deleteExternalRepositoryConnection

        void deleteExternalRepositoryConnection(IExternalRepositoryConnectionHandle externalConnectionHandle)
                                        throws TeamRepositoryException
        Delete an existing external repository connection. Any synchronization rules that reference the connection are updated to no longer reference the connection.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        externalConnectionHandle - handle for the item to delete; must not be null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if the handle refers to a non-existent item
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • findExternalRepositoryConnection

        IExternalRepositoryConnection findExternalRepositoryConnection(java.lang.String name)
                                                               throws TeamRepositoryException
        Find an existing external repository connection by name.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the external connection; must not be null
        Returns:
        the external connection if found, or null if not
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • getAllExternalRepositoryConnections

        IExternalRepositoryConnection[] getAllExternalRepositoryConnections()
                                                                    throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get handles for all existing external repository connections.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Returns:
        an array of IExternalRepositoryConnection objects with full state; never null; may be empty
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • saveSyncRule

        IItemsResponse saveSyncRule(ISyncRule syncRule)
                            throws TeamRepositoryException
        Save a new or updated synchronization rule to the repository. The incoming sync rule object must be either a new item or a working copy of an existing item. The sync rule must also be associated with a project area.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        syncRule - the sync rule to save; must be either a new item or working copy; never null
        Returns:
        a response descriptor containing the saved item (if successful) and an operation report; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • deleteSyncRule

        void deleteSyncRule(ISyncRuleHandle syncRule)
                    throws TeamRepositoryException
        Delete a synchronization rule from the repository.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        syncRule - the handle of a sync rule to delete
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if the handle refers to a non-existent item
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • findSyncRule

        ISyncRule findSyncRule(java.lang.String name)
                       throws TeamRepositoryException
        Find a synchronization rule, given its name.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sync rule
        Returns:
        the sync rule if found, or null if not
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • findSyncRulesByExternalTypeName

        ISyncRuleHandle[] findSyncRulesByExternalTypeName(java.lang.String typeName)
                                                  throws TeamRepositoryException
        Find any synchronization rules that are for a given external type.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        typeName - a pattern for the external type name to search for; '%' will match any substring and '_' will match any character
        Returns:
        array of sync rule handles which have matching external type name properties; may be empty; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

        Find any synchronization rules that use a specific external repository connection.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        externalConnectionHandle - handle for the external repository connection; if null, then synchronization rules which do not reference any repository connection are returned
        Returns:
        array of sync rule handles which reference the external connection (or have no reference); may be empty; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

        0.6

      • isSynchronizationEnabled

        boolean isSynchronizationEnabled(ISyncRule syncRule)
                                 throws TeamRepositoryException
        Determine whether synchronization is enabled for a particular synchronization rule. If synchronization is disabled, then attempts to update any ExternalState or ExternalProxy object associated with the synchronization rule will fail, and any synchronization attempt will be ignored. This is normally done by a client in preparation for deleting a synchronization rule.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        syncRule - the synchronization rule to check
        Returns:
        true if synchronization is enabled, false if not
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if synchronization rule does not exist in repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • setSynchronizationEnabled

        void setSynchronizationEnabled(ISyncRule syncRule,
                             boolean enabled)
                               throws TeamRepositoryException
        Set whether synchronization is enabled for a synchronization rule. By default, synchronization is enabled.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        syncRule - the synchronization rule to enable or disable
        enabled - true to enable synchronization, false to disable it
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if synchronization rule does not exist in repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • getLastSearchTime

        java.sql.Timestamp getLastSearchTime(ISyncRule syncRule)
                                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get the time of the most recent scan for outgoing changes that was done for the given synchronization rule, if any.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        syncRule - the synchronization rule to get the last search time for
        Returns:
        the time of the last outgoing synchronization scan, or null if one has never been done
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if synchronization rule does not exist in repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • resetLastSearchTime

        void resetLastSearchTime(ISyncRule syncRule,
                       boolean asAllModified)
                         throws TeamRepositoryException
        Clear the time of the most recent scan for outgoing changes that was done for the given synchronization rule.

        The time can be cleared in two ways: as if outgoing synchronization has never been run, in which case the next scan will consider all items covered by the synchronization rule that have been modified since the synchronization rule was last modified, or as if the last scan occurred before the existence of any item, so that all existing items covered by the synchronization rule are considered.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction.

        Parameters:
        syncRule - the synchronization rule to reset the last search time for
        asAllModified - if false, next scan will consider only items modified after the sync rule; if true, next scan will consider all existing items covered by the sync rule
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if synchronization rule does not exist in repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong
        Since:
        0.6

      • getItemManagerInfo

        IManagerInfoDTO[] getItemManagerInfo()
                                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Get information about the item managers currently registered in the server. This information is used by the synchronization rule editor.
        Returns:
        array of manager descriptors; never null; may be empty
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • synchronizeIncoming

        void synchronizeIncoming(IExternalProxyHandle proxyHandle,
                       IExternalStateHandle xstateHandle,
                       IAuditableHandle syncedItemStateHandle,
                       ISyncRuleHandle syncRuleHandle)
                         throws TeamRepositoryException
        Schedule synchronization of a Jazz item with the state of an external object. The external object is represented by its proxy. If a Jazz item is already associated with the proxy, it is updated (if possible); otherwise, a new item is created (if possible).

        If the xstateHandle argument is not null, then it must be a state handle (not just an item handle), and synchronization will be done with respect to the particular state supplied. Otherwise, synchronization will be done with respect to the latest external state associated with the proxy at the time the request is processed.

        The synchronization request is put at the end of a queue of any other pending requests for the same proxy object, and this method returns immediately.

        Note that if no incoming synchronization is configured (either because there is no sync rule, or it does not specify incoming synchronization), then this method does nothing.

        Parameters:
        proxyHandle - the handle of the proxy for the external object; never null
        xstateHandle - the handle for the external state to synchronize with, or null to use the latest state associated with the proxy
        syncedItemStateHandle - handle of the Jazz item state that is known to have been synchronized with the external object (i.e. after a manual merge), or null if the external object was independently modified
        syncRuleHandle - the handle for the synchronization rule for the combination of external object type and Jazz item type, or null to use the synchronization rule already associated with the proxy
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • synchronizeIncomingAndWait

        IExternalProxy synchronizeIncomingAndWait(IExternalProxyHandle proxyHandle,
                                        IExternalStateHandle xstateHandle,
                                        IAuditableHandle syncedItemStateHandle,
                                        ISyncRuleHandle syncRuleHandle)
                                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Schedule synchronization of a Jazz item with the state of an external object, and wait for the request to complete.

        If the request completes normally, the full state of the proxy object resulting from processing the request is returned. If the request did not complete normally (meaning that it was aborted or cancelled, not that there was a synchronization error), then null is returned.

        See #synchronizeIncoming(IExternalProxyHandle, IExternalStateHandle, ISyncRuleHandle) for details on how the request is processed.

        Parameters:
        proxyHandle - the handle of the proxy for the external object; never null
        xstateHandle - the handle for the new external state, or null to use the latest state associated with the proxy
        syncedItemStateHandle - handle of the Jazz item state that is known to have been synchronized with the external object (i.e. after a manual merge), or null if the external object was independently modified
        syncRuleHandle - the handle for the synchronization rule for the combination of external object type and Jazz item type, or null to use the synchronization rule already associated with the proxy
        Returns:
        the state of the proxy after the synchronization request is completed, or null if the request was terminated early
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • synchronizeOutgoing

        void synchronizeOutgoing(IItemHandle itemHandle,
                       IExternalStateHandle syncedXstateHandle,
                       ISyncRuleHandle syncRuleHandle)
                         throws TeamRepositoryException
        Schedule synchronization of an external object associated with a Jazz item, if there is one. (If not, this method is a no-op.)

        The synchronization request is put at the end of a queue of any other pending requests for the same proxy object, and this method returns immediately.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        itemHandle - handle to a Jazz item that may be associated with an external object; if the item has history and the handle does not identify a state, then the latest state of the item is used
        syncedXstateHandle - handle of the external state that the Jazz item is known to have been synchronized with (i.e. after a manual merge), or null if the item was independently modified
        syncRuleHandle - handle for the synchronization rule for the combination of external object type and Jazz item type, or null to use the synchronization rule already associated with the proxy
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • synchronizeOutgoingAndWait

        IExternalProxy synchronizeOutgoingAndWait(IItemHandle itemHandle,
                                        IExternalStateHandle syncedXstateHandle,
                                        ISyncRuleHandle syncRuleHandle)
                                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Schedule synchronization of an external object associated with a Jazz item, if there is one, and wait for the request to complete.

        If the request completes normally, the full state of the proxy object resulting from processing the request is returned. If the request did not complete normally (meaning that it was aborted or cancelled, not that there was a synchronization error), then null is returned.

        See #synchronizeOutgoing(IItemHandle, ISyncRuleHandle) for details on how the request is processed.

        Transactional characteristics: This method reads the repository. The method can be nested inside a transaction.

        Parameters:
        itemHandle - handle to a Jazz item that may be associated with an external object; if the item has history and the handle does not identify a state, then the latest state of the item is used
        syncedXstateHandle - handle of the external state that the Jazz item is known to have been synchronized with (i.e. after a manual merge), or null if the item was independently modified
        syncRuleHandle - handle for the synchronization rule for the combination of external object type and Jazz item type, or null to use the synchronization rule already associated with the proxy
        Returns:
        the state of the proxy after the synchronization request is completed, or null if the request was terminated early
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • synchronizeOutgoingAllItems

        void synchronizeOutgoingAllItems(ISyncRuleHandle syncRuleHandle)
                                 throws TeamRepositoryException
        Do outgoing synchronization for any Jazz items covered by a given synchronization rule. The items that are considered for outgoing synchronization depend upon the state of the last search time attribute of the synchronization rule; see resetLastSearchTime(ISyncRule, boolean) for the details.

        The sync rule is updated to record the last search time.

        The sync rule must define the type of Jazz item it covers, or no search will be done.

        This method returns immediately; the synchronization is done by a background task.

        Transactional characteristics: This method modifies the repository. The method can be nested inside a write transaction, but it can run for a long time, so that is not advisable.

        Parameters:
        syncRuleHandle - handle for the sync rule defining the type of Jazz items to consider for synchronization
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        ItemNotFoundException - if there is no sync rule for the sync rule handle
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • synchronizeDeletion

        void synchronizeDeletion(IExternalProxyHandle proxyHandle)
                         throws TeamRepositoryException
        Schedule synchronization of the deletion of a proxy for an external object. Any external state and links associated with the proxy are also deleted, but not the target Jazz item or external object.

        The synchronization request is put at the end of a queue of any other pending requests for the same proxy object, and this method returns immediately.

        Parameters:
        proxyHandle - the handle of the proxy for the external object; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • synchronizeDeletionAndWait

        void synchronizeDeletionAndWait(IExternalProxyHandle proxyHandle)
                                throws TeamRepositoryException
        Schedule synchronization of the deletion of a proxy for an external object, and wait for the request to be processed.

        See synchronizeDeletion(IExternalProxyHandle) for details on how the request is processed.

        Parameters:
        proxyHandle - the handle of the proxy for the external object; never null
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the operation fails because the client was not logged in to the repository
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything else goes wrong

      • setOutgoingSyncJobState

        void setOutgoingSyncJobState(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable the outgoing sync job. This method is for testing purposes only; normally, the job should never be disabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable the job, false to disable

      • setSynchronizeAllNewContributors

        void setSynchronizeAllNewContributors(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable the whether or not all contributors are synced out, or just ones associated with other synced objects. This method is for testing purposes only; It should be set via the server web UI
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable the job, false to disable
